servers.name: OpenTunnel
servers.cert:
client
dev tun
proto tcp
remote sgo-2.optnl.com 1194
auth-nocache
resolv-retry infinite
route-method exe
resolv-retry infinite
cipher AES-128-CBC
nobind
persist-key
persist-tun
remote-cert-tls server
auth-user-pass
comp-lzo
verb 3
<ca>
